alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 1:22PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Jackson, Decatur and southeastern Seminole Counties through 200 PM EDT/100 PM CDT/... At 122 PM EDT/1222 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Chattahoochee, or 17 miles east of Marianna, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, West Bainbridge, Chattahoochee, Sneads, Grand Ridge, Attapulgus, Seminole State Park, Desser, Hanover, Reynoldsville, Recovery, Faceville, Laingkat, Drakes Still, Jinks, Fowlstown, Fairchild and Lake Seminole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
